// 34-NEJI by 71*3 space.
//
// Notated as 34edo ups & downs, mapped as:
// 3/2 = 20\34
// 9/8 = 6\34
// 256/243 = 2\34
// 2187/2048 = 4\34
//
// From Zhea: https://twitter.com/iamzheanna/status/1623848355003781121

A4: 440
// the nominal & acc chain tunings don't matter because all of them
// will be overriden by the tuning override
0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2/1

bb b (0) # x
v3 v2 v (0) ^ ^2 ^3

lig(1,2)!
-2 -3 bbv3
-2 -2 bbv2
-2 -1 bbv
-2 1 bb^
-2 2 bb^2
-2 3 bb^3
-1 -3 bv3
-1 -2 bv2
-1 -1 bv
-1 1 b^
-1 2 b^2
-1 3 b^3
1 -3 #v3
1 -2 #v2
1 -1 #v
1 1 #^
1 2 #^2
1 3 #^3
2 -3 xv3
2 -2 xv2
2 -1 xv
2 1 x^
2 2 x^2
2 3 x^3
-2 0 bb
-1 0 b
0 -3 v3
0 -2 v2
0 -1 v
0 1 ^
0 2 ^2
0 3 ^3
1 0 #
2 0 x

// declare tuning overrides for each accidental vector

override()
0 -2 -3 350/219/(2)
0 -2 -2 119/73/(2)
0 -2 -1 5/3/(2)
